snippet: R.A. Dickey did not display the dominance he has shown so often this season, but David Wright’s hit in the bottom of the ninth capped a late Mets comeback to defeat the Phillies.
abstract: New York Mets defeat the Philadelphia Philles, 6-5; Mets pitcher R A Dickey struggles, but third baseman David Wright's game-ending single in the ninth caps a late game rally.
lead_paragraph: R.A. Dickey did not display the dominance he has shown so often this season, but David Wright’s hit in the bottom of the ninth capped a late Mets comeback to defeat the Phillies.

headline.seo: Mets Defeat Phillies on Wright’s 9th-Inning Single
headline.main: Wright Caps Mets’ Wild Rally in the 9th
headline.print_headline: Dickey Struggles, but Wright Caps Mets’ Wild Rally in 9th
